divs: Sighting DetailsCIRCULAR TYPE OBJECT, SEAM TO CHANGE SHAPE THAT REMINDED ME OF SOME THING ON FIRE. OBJECT MOVED SLOWLY. IT HAD STRANGE REFLECTIVE PROPERTIES, THAT LOOKED SIMILAR TO A FIRE IN THAT THE LIGHT FROM IT SIMMERED OR REFLECTED LIKE A FIRE. BUT AT SAME TIME WASN'T. IT MOVED IN STRAIGHT LINES FORWARD AND REVERSE AN EAST AND WEST. OBJECT ALSO FLOATED IN ONE SPOT. OBJECT SLOWLY HEADED NORTH UNTIL IT WAS A SMALL YELLOWISH RED ORANGE BALL SHAPE AND THEN WITH A BLINK OF THE EYE WAS GONE. SEVERAL PEOPLE IN OMAHA NEBRASKA SAID THEY ALSO SAW IT. OMAHA IS 40 MILES SOUTH OF THE LOCATION I WAS AT. AS MY WIFE AND I WATCHED IT A COUPLE OF PEOPLE JOGED BY US CHASING IS THING. THESE TWO MEN SAID THEY HAD BEEN WATCHING IT FOR ABOUT 30 MINUTES. THE WHOLE EXPERENCE WAS STRANGE AND EXCITING. I STILL THINK OF THIS OFTEN. I HAVE SEEN OTHER ODD THINS IN THE SKY BEFORE BUT NEVER FOR A 15-20 MINUTE PERIOD.
trends: There have been no other sightings in Little Sioux
This sighting has never been favorited.
Summary: WE WERE AT CAMPER MY WIFE AND I ALONG WITH SEVERAL OTHER PEOPLE ALSO SEEN IT.
